review.rating: A decent place for a one-night-staying
review.comment_positive: Property was fine except for a fact that it does not look like what was being shown on the app. But in overall, everything was good
The staff were very nice.
review.comment_negative: The rooms and the pictures did not match. Location was far away from other stores, rooms were rather dirty. The air con was broken :(, the shelves were dirty and broken. Dusty and I had allergies.

review.comment_positive: I was looking for quiet, and this place filled the bill. Set back off the hwy but quick walk to supermarket and coffee shop.

Bed is really comfortable and I can use my laptop there. You can buy small snacks at the lobby. The lift is a real convenience, and is rarely found in similarly priced accommodations. My dog loves the place too.
review.comment_negative: Grab drivers sometimes struggle to find the hotel. Otherwise itâ€™s great.

review.comment_positive:
Friendly, helpful English-speaking reception staff.
Strong air-con.
Pleasantly clean room walls and ceiling.
Great location - very quiet but near the main highway and all food (market, bakery, cafes).
review.comment_negative:
Extremely small bathroom - the shower head sent water almost into the toilet bowl underneath!
Creaky bed - not so fun if only a single guest...
The room was offered as an upgrade, but was a perfectly standard Vietnamese hotel room for the price - nothing special.

review.room_type: PhÃ²ng Deluxe CoÌ GiÆ°Æ¡Ì€ng CÆ¡Ìƒ Queen
review.comment_positive: Went there only 1 night to get a break from travelling. The owner is superfriendly and helpful. Itâ€™s actually a quiet, peaceful area and the shopping mall is close.
review.comment_negative: Could use a thorough cleaning. Its all a bit old, but it does not have to be dusty and stained. Was not to sure about the sheets, too. So thats a shame, would like to give a better rating.

review.rating: Good hotel with hospitable and helpful staff!
review.room_type: PhÃ²ng Deluxe CoÌ GiÆ°Æ¡Ì€ng CÆ¡Ìƒ Queen
review.comment_positive: I booked this hotel because its location is close to National University. It takes about 10 minutes to National University by Grab. The room is quite good, furniture (bedsheets) is not so new but acceptable. The highlight is that the staff is so nice and willing to help! They helped me to prepare breakfast at 6:00am as we had to leave early for the national examination. If you have things to do around National University, I think you can choose this hotel.

review.room_type: PhÃ²ng Deluxe CoÌ GiÆ°Æ¡Ì€ng CÆ¡Ìƒ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very friendly customer service, kind manager!..
review.comment_negative: The room is too small

review.room_type: PhÃ²ng Deluxe CoÌ GiÆ°Æ¡Ì€ng CÆ¡Ìƒ Queen
review.comment_positive: Very comfortable rooms at a great price
review.comment_negative: Grab drivers struggle to find the hotel

- The hotel charged an extra amount for early check-in when I checked out, without informing at the check-in time. 
- The discounted price on booking.com is higher than the set price at the hotel.
- The room is very small, without a wardrobe.

review.comment_positive: Ok
review.comment_negative: Ok

review.comment_positive: I love to stayed in this hotel . it nice and quite place to sleep . the staff friendly and helpful

review.room_type: PhÃ²ng Deluxe CoÌ GiÆ°Æ¡Ì€ng CÆ¡Ìƒ Queen
review.comment_positive:
Great budget option about 2km away from the train station. Clean rooms and friendly staff! Situated on a communal courtyard in a quiet area with really friendly locals, the perfect place to wind down from a hectic itinerary before or after going to Saigon. 
I will definitely return whenever I am in the area.
review.comment_negative: Everything was great, no complaints!

review.comment_positive: Good price. Quiet location. Clean rooms. Good wifi. Very friendly and kind staff. Easy to find. It's perfect if you're trying to stay on a budget a little cheaper than in the city. Will come again if I'm in the area.

review.room_type: PhÃ²ng Deluxe CoÌ GiÆ°Æ¡Ì€ng CÆ¡Ìƒ Queen
review.comment_positive: Es ist schÃ¶n ruhig, sieht gut aus.
Endroit trÃ¨s tranquille et prix imbattable. Personnel trÃ¨s arrangeant, je recommande.
